movies.title: Les yeux jaunes des crocodiles
movies.plot: Two sisters, their families, and sometimes complicated lives.
movies.simplePlot: Two sisters, their families, and sometimes complicated lives.

biography.bio: Julie Depardieu was born on June 18, 1973 in Paris, France as Julie Marion Depardieu. She is an actress, known for A Very Long Engagement (2004), Blame it on Fidel (2006) and Female Agents (2008).
biography.name: Julie Depardieu

biography.bio: Emmanuelle Béart was born August 14, 1963, in Gassin, France. She lived with her mother, brothers, and sister on a farm not far from Saint-Tropez in Provence (southern France), because her father, singer and poet Guy Béart, did not want his children to be affected by the glamour world of Paris. When Emmanuelle was thirteen, she saw Romy Schneider in the movie Mado (1976). From that time on, she wanted to be an actress. In Emmanuelle's teens, her parents sent her to Montreal, Quebec, Canada, for four years, so she could learn English. There, she was engaged for a Robert Altman movie that was never made. After returning to France, she took drama classes and got her first TV role, in Raison perdue (1984). David Hamilton, the photographer/director, was impressed by her beauty and gave her a role in Premiers désirs (1983). She met her spouse-to-be, Daniel Auteuil, while making L'amour en douce (1985). The film that made her famous in France was Manon of the Spring (1986), in which she played the role of a blonde shepherd dancing nude in the fields. Director Tom McLoughlin chose her out of 5,000 candidates for her first Hollywood picture, Date with an Angel (1987). Emmanuelle is a very sensitive and a perfectionist. For the part of Camille in the film Un Coeur en Hiver (1992), she took violin lessons for a whole year. Her biggest success was as a nude model in the art film La belle noiseuse (1991), which starred Michel Piccoli and was directed by Jacques Rivette.
biography.name: Emmanuelle Béart

biography.bio: Patrick Bruel was born on May 14, 1959 in Tlemcen, Oran, France as Patrick Benguigui. He is one of the most famous French singer and actor, known for Le prénom (2012), and Un secret (2007). He was married to writer Amanda Sthers from September 2004 to 2008 . They have two children Oscar and Leon.
biography.name: Patrick Bruel

biography.bio: Alice Isaaz is an actress, known for Elle (2016), La crème de la crème (2014) and Un moment d'égarement (2015).
biography.name: Alice Isaaz

biography.bio: Jacques Weber was born on August 23, 1949 in Paris, France. He is an actor and director, known for Cyrano de Bergerac (1990), State of Siege (1972) and Odette Toulemonde (2006). He has been married to Christine since 1970. They have three children.
biography.name: Jacques Weber

biography.bio: Karole Rocher was born in 1974 in Bezons, Val-d'Oise, France. She is an actress and director, known for Polisse (2011), Stella (2008) and Les neiges du Kilimandjaro (2011).
biography.name: Karole Rocher

biography.bio: Edith Scob was born on October 21, 1937 in Paris, France as Edith Helena Vladimirovna Scobeltzine. She is an actress, known for Holy Motors (2012), Vidocq (2001) and Brotherhood of the Wolf (2001). She is married to Georges Aperghis.
biography.name: Edith Scob

biography.bio: Smiling, talented, eclectic actor Samuel Le Bihan seems to be one of the most popular actors in France and Europe. He acceded to stardom thanks to movies like Brotherhood of the Wolf (2001), "Jet Set", "Shooting stars", "The code", À la folie... pas du tout (2002) but Samuel also showed his ability to play deeper roles in less commercial movies like "New dawn", "Le cousin", "Captain Conan", "Venus beauty institute" or "Rage". After having played with Samy Naceri, with Vincent Cassel and Monica Bellucci and twice alongside Audrey Tautou, Le Bihan is now aspiring to international stardom by playing alongside Robert De Niro and Harvey Keitel.
biography.name: Samuel Le Bihan

biography.bio: Quim Gutiérrez was born on March 27, 1981 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Joaquim Gutiérrez Ylla. He is an actor, known for Poble Nou (1994), Dark Blue Almost Black (2006) and The Hidden Face (2011).
biography.name: Quim Gutiérrez

biography.bio: Jana Bittnerova is an actress, known for Dans la maison (2012), Dheepan (2015) and Camille redouble (2012).
biography.name: Jana Bittnerova

biography.bio: Nancy Tate is an actress, known for Beyond: Two Souls (2013), Elle s'appelait Sarah (2010) and Les temps changent (2008).
biography.name: Nancy Tate

biography.bio: Alysson Paradis was born in 1982 in France as Alison Paradis. She is an actress, known for Inside (2007), Un jour de lucidité (2014) and The Childhood of Icarus (2009).
biography.name: Alysson Paradis

biography.bio: Nathalie Besançon is an actress, known for La journée de la jupe (2008), Enquêtes réservées (2009) and Happenstance (2000).
biography.name: Nathalie Besançon

biography.bio: Bruno Debrandt is an actor and producer, known for Caïn (2012), La vie en miettes (2011) and Spiral (2005).
biography.name: Bruno Debrandt

biography.bio: Ariel Wizman was born on May 19, 1962 in Casablanca, Morocco. He is an actor and writer, known for Cinébus (2002), L'appartement (2000) and All the Love You Cannes! (2002).
biography.name: Ariel Wizman
